bibl.title: Codices Latini Antiquiores. A palaeographical Guide to Latin manuscripts prior to the ninth century. Supplement.
bibl.note: Nos 1671-1811 [newly found representatives from nearly every country; nearly half of the items are papyri]. - Pp. 43-67: Selected supplementary bibliography for C.L.A. I-XI; - 68-71: Selected bibliography for C.L.A. Suppl.; - 73-84: Indexes to the completed series: Index of authors, by R.A.B. Mynors; - List of manuscripts; - Index of provenances, by R.A.B. Mynors.
bibl.seg: Lowe E.A., Codices Latini Antiquiores. A palaeographical Guide to Latin manuscripts prior to the ninth century. Supplement.
Oxford, Clarendon Press, 1971, in fol., xii-84 pp. et nombr. pll.

Nos 1671-1811 [newly found representatives from nearly every country; nearly half of the items are papyri]. - Pp. 43-67: Selected supplementary bibliography for C.L.A. I-XI; - 68-71: Selected bibliography for C.L.A. Suppl.; - 73-84: Indexes to the completed series: Index of authors, by R.A.B. Mynors; - List of manuscripts; - Index of provenances, by R.A.B. Mynors.
